St._Louis.Gateway STEM High School:
Gateway STEM High School (formerly known as Gateway Institute of Technology) is a public magnet high school in St. Louis, Missouri, USA.


== History ==
Gateway opened as John O'Fallon Technical High School in 1956, named in honor of John O'Fallon. Under its former name it opened in August 1992, in response to a court order mandating the establishment of a high technology magnet school.The school ultimately integrated now closed high schools Health Careers and the Academy of Mathematics & Science (Saint Louis The school integrates a strong academic curriculum emphasizing mathematics and science with career preparation in highly technical fields.
